currentMembers.name: Mr. kapil Dev
currentMembers.about:
Hello! I'm Kapil Dev, a dedicated Ph.D. researcher at the School of Computer and Systems Sciences, Jawaharlal Nehru University (JNU), New Delhi. Currently pursuing advanced research in Computer Science, I am passionate about cutting-edge technologies, theoretical foundations, and real-world applications that solve meaningful problems.
 My academic journey reflects a strong commitment to knowledge, innovation, and ethical research practices. I believe in bridging the gap between theoretical computer science and its transformative impact on society.

currentMembers.research Work: Currently enrolled in the Monsoon 2025 semester and actively working on my doctoral thesis under the guidance of my advisor Dr. Saurabh Kumar Sharma. My research focuses on emerging trends in computational intelligence and their scalable applications in real-time environments.

alumni.name: Ms. Goldy Pandey
alumni.about: Ms. Goldy Pandey is a passionate educator and researcher in the field of Computer Science, currently pursuing a Ph.D. in Computer Science from Jawaharlal Nehru University (JNU), New Delhi. She hold an M.Tech in Computer Science and Technology from JNU, and a B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering from NCE, a Bihar State Government Engineering College. Additionally, she has completed a Diploma (Polytechnic) in Computer Science and Engineering from SBTE, Patna. She has qualified the UGC-NET examination twice in the field of Computer Science and Applications. With two years of teaching experience as a lecturer in a State Government College (appointed through the Bihar Public Service Commission, BPSC), She bring both academic rigor and classroom experience to her courses. Her core areas of interest include data analytics, machine learning, and programming. She is dedicated to simplifying complex technical concepts and helping learners build a strong foundation in data analytics through structured and practical teaching
alumni.education: PhD Computer Science, JNU. M.Tech CS&T, JNU

alumni.name: Ms. Mankirat Kaur
alumni.about: Ms. Mankirat Kaur is a passionate educator and researcher in the field of Computer Science, currently working as an Assistant professor at GTBIT, New Delhi. She hold an M.Tech in Computer Science and Technology from JNU, and a B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering from GTBIT. She has qualified the UGC-NET examination in the field of Computer Science and Applications. Her core areas of interest include Bio Computation and machine learning.

alumni.name: Mr. Jamaluddin
alumni.about: Mr. Jamaluddin is a passionate researcher in the field of Computer Science, currently pursuing PhD in Computer Science at AMU, Aligarh. He hold an M.Tech in Computer Science and Technology from JNU, and a MCA & BSc in Computer Science from AMU. He has qualified the GATE in Computer Science and Applications. His core areas of interest include bio computation, deep learning and indian languages.
